original_text: But King Sihon did not trust the Israelites. He would not let them travel through his land. He brought his whole army to meet together at Jahaz. Then he fought against the Israelites. Ammonite cities, as far as Abel Karamim. He completely destroyed them! So the Israelites had complete power over the Ammonites.
korean_text: 시혼이 이스라엘을 믿지 아니하여 그의 지역으로 지나지 못하게 할 뿐 아니라 그의 모든 백성을 모아 야하스에 진 치고 이스라엘을 치므로

sentences.original_text: But King Sihon did not trust the Israelites
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 시혼 왕은 이스라엘 사람들을 믿지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: He would not let them travel through his land
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들이 자신의 땅을 지나가도록 허락하지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: He brought his whole army to meet together at Jahaz
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 모든 군대를 모아서 야하스에서 만났습니다

sentences.original_text: Then he fought against the Israelites
Ammonite cities, as far as Abel Karamim
So the Israelites had complete power over the Ammonites
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이스라엘 사람들은 암몬 사람들에게 완전한 권력을 가졌습니다
